repository_metadata.label: Repository metadata
repository_metadata.description: Basic information about repositories without access to file contents.

repository_content.label: Repository content
repository_content.description: Files, commits, and other source code content within repositories.

collaboration_workflow.label: Collaboration & workflow
collaboration_workflow.description: Issues, pull requests, reviews, and collaboration features.

automation_ci_cd.label: Automation, CI/CD & configuration
automation_ci_cd.description: Build automation, workflows, deployments, and configuration values.

organization_access.label: Organization-level access
organization_access.description: Permissions that apply across an organization rather than individual repositories.

unknown.label: Unknown data access
unknown.description: Permissions not yet classified by PermLens.
